name: Super Fruit Parfait
author: Carnation Breakfast Essentials
summary: Layers of a creamy vanilla mixture, chia seeds, puffed cereal, kiwi, coconut, pomegranate seeds, and mango make a quick and delicious dessert or snack.
ingredients: ¾ cup plain low-fat Greek yogurt
1 packet CARNATION BREAKFAST ESSENTIALS® Powder Drink Mix
¾ cup 7-grain puffed cereal (such as Kashi® brand)
⅓ cup chopped fresh kiwi fruit
directions: In a small bowl stir together yogurt and Carnation Breakfast Essentials® Classic French Vanilla Powdered Drink Mix until combined
In a pint glass spoon half of the yogurt mixture
Top with half of the chia seeds, half of the cereal, the kiwi, and half of the coconut
Repeat layers, with half of the yogurt mixture, chia seeds, and cereal
Finish layering with the mango, remaining half of the coconut, and pomegranate seeds
